getFragment

String getFragment()
Deprecated. 
Returns the content of the fragment as a string.

Returns:
the fragment content. Never null

setFragment

void setFragment(String content)
Deprecated. 
Sets the content of the fragment. Any previously set content is replaced.

Parameters:
content - content to set. Must not be null.

confirmSetFragment

Boolean confirmSetFragment(String content)
Deprecated. 
Confirms whether setting the fragment is possible.

Parameters:
content - content to set; must not be null
Returns:
true if the value can be set, otherwise false.
